contact.group: Centre for Ophthalmology and Visual Science, The University of Western Australia

publications.title: Generation of the induced pluripotent stem cell line from a patient with autosomal recessive ABCA4-mediated Stargardt Macular Dystrophy

donor.disease_description: Autosomal recessive Stargardt disease caused by compound heterozygous mutations in the ABCA4 gene

genomic_modifications.description: Compound heterozygous for ABCA4 c.4139C>T and c.5461-10T>C

genomic_characterisation.summary: Matched at 16 loci, normal 46,XX karyotype, 500,000 human SNPs analyzed, no genomic abnormalities detected.
genomic_characterisation.karyotype_method: Illumina Beadchip SNP Array with CNV Analysis

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal iPSC Reprogramming Plasmid kit (SC900A-1, System Biosciences)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
